verbs.description: it [V: may] look easy but putting on peter anderson festival is anything but the 40th annual peter anderson festival will open saturday morning in downtown ocean springs with some 150 000 people flocking to downtown ocean springs to enjoy the 450 vendors including artisans food booths and entertainment after four decades the festival seems to just happen without much prior fuss visitors and locals alike arrive saturday morning to find the neatly erected rows of vendor booths clean streets and welcoming people while it may appear after all these year an easy task for those responsible for putting on the festival it is anything but the planning that goes into this festival takes every bit of a year to make sure it comes off without a hitch said chic cody the city special event coordinator let me tell you something every person that works this is invaluable because it takes a lot of work and a lot of patience there a lot of people involved it really something else most people do n't know or see the work involved the event is put on each year by the ocean springs chamber of commerce chamber executive director cynthia sutton said the planning for each year anderson festival begins almost as soon mississippi south mississippi festival ocean springs official ocean springs mississippi peter anderson festival coordinator anderson ocean springs chamber of commerce executive director chic cody cynthia sutton blue moon

[ARG0: it] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: look] [ARG1: easy] but putting on peter anderson festival is anything but the 40th annual peter anderson festival will open saturday morning in downtown ocean springs with some 150 000 people flocking to downtown ocean springs to enjoy the 450 vendors including artisans food booths and entertainment after four decades the festival seems to just happen without much prior fuss visitors and locals alike arrive saturday morning to find the neatly erected rows of vendor booths clean streets and welcoming people while it may appear after all these year an easy task for those responsible for putting on the festival it is anything but the planning that goes into this festival takes every bit of a year to make sure it comes off without a hitch said chic cody the city special event coordinator let me tell you something every person that works this is invaluable because it takes a lot of work and a lot of patience there a lot of people involved it really something else most people do n't know or see the work involved the event is put on each year by the ocean springs chamber of commerce chamber executive director cynthia sutton said the planning for each year anderson festival begins almost as soon mississippi south mississippi festival ocean springs official ocean springs mississippi peter anderson festival coordinator anderson ocean springs chamber of commerce executive director chic cody cynthia sutton blue moon

it may look easy but [V: putting] on [ARG1: peter anderson festival] is anything but the 40th annual peter anderson festival will open saturday morning in downtown ocean springs with some 150 000 people flocking to downtown ocean springs to enjoy the 450 vendors including artisans food booths and entertainment after four decades the festival seems to just happen without much prior fuss visitors and locals alike arrive saturday morning to find the neatly erected rows of vendor booths clean streets and welcoming people while it may appear after all these year an easy task for those responsible for putting on the festival it is anything but the planning that goes into this festival takes every bit of a year to make sure it comes off without a hitch said chic cody the city special event coordinator let me tell you something every person that works this is invaluable because it takes a lot of work and a lot of patience there a lot of people involved it really something else most people do n't know or see the work involved the event is put on each year by the ocean springs chamber of commerce chamber executive director cynthia sutton said the planning for each year anderson festival begins almost as soon mississippi south mississippi festival ocean springs official ocean springs mississippi peter anderson festival coordinator anderson ocean springs chamber of commerce executive director chic cody cynthia sutton blue moon
